sub_title: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy
summary:
An Digital Transformation Leader who looks into the (emerging) technology and how this can enable Business solutions and innovations. Thougthleader for (Multi) Cloud solutions touching the complete cloud scope to maximize the adoption of cloud technology to create business solutions.

With a broad experience in Digital Transformation programs I looks into the (emerging) technology and how this can enable and solve Business problems, create solutions and innovations. Growing organizations into the new DX world and becoming or growing further as an digital native.

Lead ESG Technology Supply Chain Transparancy. Using technology to help unlock ESG goals and providing insights and transparancy over the Supply Chain.

With a strong background in technology, technical leadership and a good view on business opportunities.
An actionable and results-focused digital native who is passionate about making a positive impact and driving business growth.

Alongside a strategic business focus and knowledge of multiple business domains like marketing, online and entrepreneurship continues to uphold a very strong background in IT and in-depth knowledge of many IT topics.

A proud member of the Lions Club (Vathorst Amersfoort) to help the community where needed.

projects.title: VTL
projects.description:
VTL had chosen to implement a new Microsoft CRM system to manage their trainees and training companies. The new CRM system needed to be coupled to legacy and new implemented systems.

Mr. Siegers had the task to lead the architectural decisions and provide development teams with guidelines and tasks .
Moreover, Mr. Siegers has helped to deploy BizTalk Server with the aim to integrate the various other systems. Mr Siegers advised , in setting up various security related issues in architectural studies, on how the entire solution was optimal safely.

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: Asics
projects.description:
Asics had many systems changed in its landscape the recent years . Because of the many changes in BizTalk , CRM and SharePoint solutions, the question arose whether the current architecture and platform were reliable enough in emergencies.

In the role of Solution Architect Mr. Siegers has been tasked to identify the entire platform and translate it into a SOA-based architecture. From this starting point , Mr. Siegers set a new architecture , which makes products such as SharePoint , BizTalk , CRM and various web services could be better used . Mr. Siegers has several architectural documents, such as a project start architecture and Architecture Guidelines , delivered over how the products could be better used and what products additional enhancements were recommended .

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: Shell
projects.description:
Shell wanted to optimize the Global Performance Review process using SharePoint. The goal was to make the assessment form available to the employees .

Mr. Siegers Shell helped with the installation of Duet Enterprise software . In the design Mr. Siegers has identified opportunities on the possibilities to make information available to employees through SharePoint and InfoPath. Here Mr Siegers had looked at preserving data integrity , security , and robustness of the solution. In this project, Mr. Siegers has worked with several offshore teams to realize the project.

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: Orangina Schweppes
projects.description:
Orangina Schweppes had the objective to link its SAP landscape to its Microsoft SharePoint environment. Orangina Schweppes wanted to see Duet Enterprise was used for the integration.

During this project, Mr. Siegers was the architect for the solution of the SAP and Microsoft platform. Mr Siegers with SAP and Microsoft team worked out the processes and describes how they should be developed in SAP and SharePoint. The SharePoint solution consisted of a customer order that was developed in a web part , which is integrated via the Duet Enterprise component for SharePoint with SAP. On the SAP side helped Mr Siegers along with the establishment of the SAP NetWeaver Gateway for integration with SharePoint.

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: LMN Airmiles
projects.description:
LMN Airmiles is a savingssystem for different stores that customer can earn ’airmiles’. LMN decided that a new solution was needed for their needs. The decision was to make a new solution based on Microsoft SharePoint technology and SAP netweaver, CRM and BI.

Christian’s rol was to get the business needs and requirements clear. In this proces Christian made an Architectural overview of the complete solution. Made an technical software architecture document for the SharePoint solution. Biggest issues where the 5mil users what would use the system.

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: RSO Haaglanden
projects.description:
RSO Haaglanden is a project for the exchange of the Electronic Medical Patient Record.

Christian was employed as Lead Architect for the project RSO Haaglanden the project.

First Christian had to focus on the Architecture documents. This is done by first Christian to see what was on documentation and code. During this transition, Christian the then current architecture mapped. The next step was to properly set up several phases so that during the design, construction and testing all components were clear.

The phases are now better taken up so that the ambiguities and pitfalls not return during the construction phase.

During the course of the project continues as a Christian leader presented in the areas of Architecture, Design and Construction. The team had a clear need for a leader who could help with making choices for the project.

contributors.headline: Senior Manager Digital Transformation at KPMG Digital Advisory | Cloud Transformation & Architecture | Lead ESG & Technology Sustainable IT & Supply Chain Transparancy

projects.title: Belastingdienst - Toeslagen
projects.description:
Christian’s job in the Toeslagen Project was coaching people from its development team. He acts as a guide for the people in his team and is regarded as an authority in the field of software architecture within the Benefits project and beyond. 

Christian acting at various levels from the feet he has to do with the senior enterprise architects and Engagement Managers at the complex and politically sensitive project Toeslagen, but also with junior developers and testers. 

The project will be gradually brought into production to minimize problems. These steps Christian plays a major role to ensure that migrations, conversions went smoothly. 

The Toeslagen project was under pressure because of the need for the new system to better serve its citizens. This deadline was at Christian’s decisions to do a release into production can proceed. These adjustments were needed in the fields of architecture, but also by release strategy and planning level. All decisions taken had been approved by the enterprise architects and project managers Toeslagen.

projects.title: Stater Backoffice
projects.description:
Christian was employed at Stater for helping Stater to switch to the Microsoft. Net platform. Christian has helped by a team of developers to migrate to the .Net platform. Establishing architectural guidelines and development guidelines were part of this task. 

Christian was also deployed on various projects to support during construction. It was Christian’s knowledge when Microsoft used to create architectures for the mid office system. This system is now stable and is used by a wide range of customers Stater.

projects.title: Intres
projects.description:
Christian was employed as a Software Architect / BizTalk Specialist at the Intres to help migrate to a Microsoft based environment. During this project, Christian BizTalk blueprint for linking all systems were newly introduced in Intres. Christian was also responsible for the link between Microsoft CRM, SharePoint and Axapta.

To realize this, Christian worked closely with various departments within Intres for the links between BizTalk and CRM and / or Axapta. The links between BizTalk and Sharepojnt Christian was accompanied by a Sharepoint Developer.

The project is implemented within a short time. For the next steps of the project is necessary to Christian architecture document and guidelines biztalk left so that the developers of Intres itself could continue to the second phase of the project.

projects.title: PGGM - MAP
projects.description:
Christian has been Senior Lead Developer / Designer deployed within 4 release of the MAP project PGGM. PGGM was busy developing a new pension system and worked closely with India. Christian was with his team responsible for delivering the designs were built in India.

In addition, Christian also lead reviewer when India constituted the code. In this process sent a Christian group of developers to analyze the produced code and where necessary adjustments to make.

Christian has also led to the innovation project as Software Architect where PGGM a step would make working with multifunctional teams. Here a group of developers and designers Christian driven ultimately led to the further introduction of this concept within the project.

profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Cloud Strategist / Transformation Leader in cloud solutions over multiple platforms. Specialized in distributed cloud environments and cloud-native technology, with a strong focus on an agnostic approach to multiple cloud platforms. Business solutions before the technical implementations. I strive for the best solution on a business as a technical level.

Thougthleader for (Multi) Cloud solutions touching the complete cloud scope to maximize the adoption of cloud technology to create business solutions.
profile_positions.title: Cloud Strategist / Lead Cloud Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description: As a Solutions Architect at AWS I craft highly scalable, flexible and resilient cloud architectures that address customer business needs and accelerate the adoption of AWS services. Also helping organizations understand best practices around advanced cloud-based solutions, and how to migrate existing workloads to the cloud.
profile_positions.title: Sr Solutions Architect - Enterprises

company.name: Rubicon - Gold Partner for Business Applications, SharePoint, Data Analytics, Apps and Cloud

profile_positions.description:
Christian is a Solution Architect specializing in (multi) cloud solutions , integration and security.  Christian's area of expertise is  on the Microsoft platform (onpremise & cloud) and Amazon AWS.

Christian is responsible for the focusgroup Architecture & Cloud and is Technical Lead on Microsoft Azure and Amazon AWS. 

Within his role Christian helps fellow employees get a  better understanding of new emerging technologies. Technologies as Azure Service Fabric, Docker, Microservices, and other new technologies will be presented through presentations or workshops for hands-on experience.
profile_positions.title: Cloud Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
Christian is an Integration / SOA architect. He specializes in Microsoft and integration to SAP environments. Christian helps organizations with the problems and challenges around SOA, integration and architecture. Through his in-depth knowledge of the Microsoft platform ,Christian creates sustainable solutions in complex environments. Christian also has extensive experience in the field of software architecture and leading and advising software development teams.

Christian's goal is to broaden his experience and knowledge on the field of SOA and integration.
Currently Christian is learning Tibco to broaden his knowledge.
On the architecture area Christian is determend to get his certificates for TOGAF 9.1 and ArchiMate 2.0. Christian's 2nd goal is becoming an SOA Certified Architect
profile_positions.title: Solution / Integration Architect

profile_positions.description:
As Thougthleader and lead of the Center of Excellence (CoE) Christian is responsible for the area's of ERP+ and BizTalk.

ERP+ is an growing market for connecting big ERP systems to a Microsoft user interface. Duet Enterprise is one of the biggest and fast growing ERP+ solutions for integrating SAP systems with Microsoft SharePoint Server.

BizTalk is the integration product of Microsoft and the CoE regconizes this. Due to the new growing integrating market BizTalk is still a leading player. BizTalk is used for connecting to differint systems within a compagny but also the link for connecting on premises as cloud solutions.

The CoE focusses on getting people trained in the area's of ERP+ and BizTalk. It also helps the sales with offerings and other technical assistance were needed. Ginving the latets insides in the new technology and getting more people enthousiastic for this area of expertise.
profile_positions.title: Thougthleader & Lead Center of Excellence ERP+ and BizTalk

profile_positions.description:
Christian Siegers is a Managing Consultant with Capgemini. Christian acts within projects as a Solution / Software Architect, leading projects to their main goal. With is broad and indepth knowledge about the Microsoft platform, Christian is a recognized Architect and expert. A appreciated speaker and writer from within Capgemini and outside.
 
Christian is a Thougthleader/Focuslead on the area of Microsoft integration. Through these experience and knowledge Christian is also the ERP+ Microsoft Technical Lead for the Netherlands. Within the ERP+ community, 
Christian focus is to pass on knowledge and experience for integrating the SAP platform with the Microsoft Platform.
 
Within Capgemini, Christian is a board member for the Software Engineering committee. Within this committee Christian’s role is to examine and coach collegue’s to a higher level in Software Engineering and getting the certificates to reach that goal. Coaching collegues to become a Guru on specific software to guiding collegues to aspiring architects and beyond.
 
For Christian is focusing on getting the Certified IT Architect from IASA and getting the degree of Enterprise Software Engineer from the Opengroup.

profile_positions.description: Guiding customers with the architectural landscape to leverage more business value through the implementation of Duet Enterprise. Will get customers up to speed with workshop, presentations, Proof of Concepts what is designed and tailored to their business needs.

Lions Vathorst is a local Lions community in the city of Amersfoort, and section of Lions International, a non-political service organization founded by Melvin Jones in 1917. It has over 46,000 local clubs and more than 1.4 million members in over 200 countries around the world. The Lions motto is 'we serve". Our main goal is to raise money for worthy causes. We plan and participate in a variety of service projects that meet the needs of our local community. Examples are an annual benefit dinner, christmas wishes, a wine tasting event and an afternoon outing with aged people.
